__comment_for_allStatuses__: All the statuses that the user can see in the meeting modal.

meetings.__comment_for_status__: The main status of the meeting. IDs need to be change in meetingDetailsModule -> isMeetingType function JS
meetings.__comment_for_type__: For test, meeting type 1 is assigned to identify the meeting from the lesson
meetings.title: פגישת תזונה
meetings.__comment_for_price_total__: Total cost of the current meeting
meetings.__comment_for_calendarName__: Appears only when there is more than 1 calendar to the branch.
meetings.__comment_for_owner__: Name of coach or guide - if the studio has only one, his name will not be displayed
meetings.__comment_for_location__: Branch name - appears only when there is more than 1 branch to the studio
meetings.__comment_for_repeat_type__: 1 - if the meeting is part of a series meeting (regular), 2 - servel time, 3 - one time meeting

customer.__comment_for_isRandom__: If the customer is a random customer, the customer's name cannot be clicked. This needs to be double checked because if the user has a meeting, it already exists on the system.
customer.__comment_for_clientActiveInfo__: ID of the suitable or current subscription
customer.name: לקוח מזדמן
customer.__comment_for_token__: Data to check if the user has a card for payment

token.__comment_for_payment_url__: Link to the relevant payment page

meetings.__comment_for_docsPayment__: From DB [docs], if there is no suitable subscription.

docs.__comment_for_Status__: There is a debt or partially paid. 0-open, 1-close, 2-pay 1/2
There is a debt or partially paid. 0-open, 1-close, 2-pay 1/2
There is a debt or partially paid. 0-open, 1-close, 2-pay 1/2

client_activities.__comment_for_entries__: Number of entries left for the current subscription

meetings.__comment_for_OTHERS__: Not used now, just copied from the lesson JSON
